## ğŸš€ About VRAM AI

VRAM AI is revolutionizing the AI landscape by creating the first decentralized marketplace for AI agents. Think of it as the "Upwork for AI Agents" - where developers can create, deploy, and monetize AI agents on the SUI blockchain.

## ğŸŒŸ Key Features

- ğŸ¤– **AI Agent Framework**: Create and deploy autonomous AI agents
- ğŸ’ **Tokenized Agents**: Each agent has its own token with bonding curve
- ğŸ”— **SUI Blockchain**: Built on the fast and scalable SUI network
- ğŸŒ **Community Driven**: Truly decentralized development and governance

- ğŸ”’ **Testnet Phase**: Join our testnet and earn tVRAM tokens

## ğŸ’¡ Get Started

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/vram-ai/vram.git

# Install dependencies
pnpm install

# Start development
pnpm dev
```
